title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet

title: 1923 Stars Michelle Randolph and Aminah Nieves on Walking Away, Holding On, and Who Might Come Back
description: TV Fanatic spoke with Michelle Randolph and Aminah Nieves for their thoughts about Elizabeth and Teonna's roles in the 1923 finale. The post 1923 Stars Michelle Randolph and Aminah Nieves on Walking Away, Holding On, and Who Might Come Back appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Carissa Pavlica

title: Julia Schlaepfer and Brandon Sklenar on 1923’s Heart-Wrenching Finale and the Enduring Power of Spencer and Alex’s Love
description: TV Fanatic caught up with 1923 stars Julia Schlaepfer and Brandon Sklenar to talk about Alex and Spencer's finale chapter. The post Julia Schlaepfer and Brandon Sklenar on 1923’s Heart-Wrenching Finale and the Enduring Power of Spencer and Alex’s Love appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Carissa Pavlica

title: Jay North, Dennis the Menace Star, Dead at 73
description: Jay North, who played the title character in CBS’ Dennis the Menace, has died. He was 73. The news of North’s death was confirmed to The Hollywood Reporter by Jeannie Russell, who played Dennis the Menace’s Margaret Wade. Russell said North died in Lake Butler, Fla., after a years-long battle with colon cancer, and called him […]
author: Claire Franken

title: 1923 Finale: Brandon Sklenar and Julia Schlaepfer on How They Delivered ‘What Everyone’s Been Waiting For’ (And Then What Happened After) — Watch
description: Warning: This post contains spoilers for 1923‘s Season 2 finale. Proceed accordingly. How could we have known that the elephant stampede and the shipwreck at sea would be the good times? 1923‘s Season 2 finale, aka the Yellowstone prequel’s series-ending episode, marks the long-awaited reunion of eternally beleaguered lovers Spencer and Alexandra. The fan-favorite characters […]
author: Kimberly Roots
